department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
=================

**ITB for Storage Building Rehabilitation at St. Anthony Airport**
---------------------------------------------------------

### Document Details

- **Tender Reference Number:** WS4316695168-Doc4332293262
- **Amendment Number:** 5
- **Publication Date:** 2023-12-06
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-09T14:00:00
- **Amendment Date:** 2024-01-03
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-28
- **Expected Contract End Date:** No end date specified

### Tender Overview

Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting qualified contractors to submit bids for the rehabilitation of the Eastside Shed at St. Anthony Airport in Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Work Requirements

The scope of work involves the supply of all necessary plant, labour, and materials to perform renovations at the Eastside Shed. The contractor is expected to complete the work within 15 weeks of award.

### Tender Documents and Submission

Tender documents are now available on [SAP Ariba](https://www logically.access SAP-ACQUIRE). Interested contractors must submit their proposals through the platform prior to the closing date.

### Important Dates

*   Site visit: to be held on a date to be announced.
*   Information sessions: not scheduled.
*   Contract award: expected to be made shortly after the closing date.

### Evaluation Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the contractor submitting the lowest-priced compliant bid.

### Technical Requirements and Specifications

The invited firms must undergo a pre-qualification process to determine eligibility. Contractors can find more information on the [CanadaBuys](https://www.canadabuys.gov) site.

### Contact Information

Fesseha, Nicole (SPAC/PSPC)
nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Atlantic Region Acquisitions

### Additional Information

*   Estimated procurement cost: $500,001 to $1,000,000
*   Language: submissions may be made in either official language of Canada

### Terms and Conditions

Refer to the tender documents and [supplementary instructions](https://www prematurely.access SAP-AQP) for more information on the tender process.


The document has been reorganised for easier reading and cleaned up of unnecessary details. Please adjust any details requested to be kept if unsure. 



Original


Invitation to Qualify for various term storage buildings at St. Anthony Airport, Newfoundland and Labrador
